oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Souvenir of Memphis, Tenn." Postcard Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Exterior Side One: "Columbian Mutual Tower" and "Waterfront."; Exterior Side Two: "Overton Park."

Interior: "Memphis, Tenn. -- 'Down in Dixie'" introductory text; "Peabody Hotel" image; "Memphis and Harahan Bridges Spanning Mississippi River" image; "Parkview Hotel" image; "Bear Pits, Overton Park" image; "Japanese Garden, Overton Park" image; "Hotel Claridge" image; "Cossitt Library and Custom House" image; "Shrine Building" image; "Madison Ave. looking East" image; "Shelby County Court House" image; "Court Square" image; "Auditorium" image; "Sunken Garden and Speedway" image; "Union Station" image; "Riverside Park" image; "Entrance to Southwestern, The College of the Mississippi Valley" image; "Confederate Park showing Post Office" image; "Entrance to Zoo, Overton Park" image;
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: hotels; bridges; parks; Overton Park; buildings; streets;
